usage() {
cat <<EOT >&2
usage: $0 <run_script>
       ln -s $0 <run_script>; <run_script>
EOT
exit 1
}

progname() {
	case "$1" in
	/*)	echo "$1" ;;
	*/*)	echo "$(cd "${1%/*}"; pwd)/${1##*/}" ;;
	*)	if [ "$PWD" = / ]; then
			echo "/$0"
		else
			echo "$PWD/$0"
		fi ;;
	esac
}

PROGNAME="$(progname "$0")"
if [ "$PROGNAME" != "/etc/runit/${TEMPLATE:-runit-run}" ]; then
        # symlinked
	SCRIPT=
elif [ $# -gt 0 ]; then
        # Sha-Bang'ed
        PROGNAME="$1"; shift
	SCRIPT=yes
else
        usage
fi

if [ -s "$PROGNAME" ] && ${SHELL:-sh} -n "$PROGNAME"; then
	PROGNAME="$(progname "$PROGNAME")"
else
        echo "$PROGNAME: invalid script" >&2
	exit 1
fi

cd "${PROGNAME%/*}"
